# CEL Function Reference

## Type Conversion
- bool(value)
- bytes(value)
- double(value)
- duration(string)
- int(value)
- string(value)
- timestamp(string)
- uint(value)
- type(value)
- dyn(value)

## AWS Functions
- aws.arnToMap(arn)
- aws.fromAWSMap(list)

## Base64
- base64.encode(bytes)
- base64.decode(string)

## Collections
- <map>.keys()
- <map>.merge(map)
- <map>.omit(list)
- <list>.sort()
- <list>.distinct()
- <list>.flatten()
- <list>.reverse()
- range(n)
- range(start, end)
- range(start, end, step)
- <list>.uniq()
- <map>.values()
- keyValToMap(string)
- <map>.mapToKeyVal()
- <list>.all(x, predicate)
- <list>.exists(x, predicate)
- <list>.exists_one(x, predicate)
- <list>.filter(x, predicate)
- <list>.fold(e, acc, binary_function)
- <map>.fold(k, v, acc, binary_function)
- has(field)
- <list>.map(x, transform)
- <list>.map(x, predicate, transform)
- <optional>.or(optional)
- <optional>.orValue(value)
- size(collection)
- <list>.slice(start, end)

## Sets
- sets.contains(list, list)
- sets.equivalent(list, list)
- sets.intersects(list, list)

## CSV
- CSV(array)

## Crypto
- crypto.SHA1(string)
- crypto.SHA256(string)
- crypto.SHA384(string)
- crypto.SHA512(string)

## Dates & Time
- timestamp(string)
- <timestamp>.getDate()
- <timestamp>.getDayOfMonth()
- <timestamp>.getDayOfWeek()
- <timestamp>.getDayOfYear()
- <timestamp>.getFullYear()
- <timestamp>.getHours()
- <timestamp>.getMilliseconds()
- <timestamp>.getMinutes()
- <timestamp>.getMonth()
- <timestamp>.getSeconds()
- duration(string)
- time.Unix(epoch)
- time.Nanosecond
- time.Microsecond
- time.Millisecond
- time.Second
- time.Minute
- time.Hour
- time.ZoneName()
- time.ZoneOffset()
- time.Parse(layout, value)
- time.ParseLocal(layout, value)
- time.ParseInLocation(layout, location, value)
- time.Now()
- time.ParseDuration(string)
- time.Since(timestamp)
- time.Until(timestamp)

## Encoding
- urlencode(string)
- urldecode(string)

## Filepath
- filepath.Base(path)
- filepath.Clean(path)
- filepath.Dir(path)
- filepath.Ext(path)
- filepath.IsAbs(path)
- filepath.Join(paths)
- filepath.Match(pattern, name)
- filepath.Rel(basepath, targpath)
- filepath.Split(path)

## JSON
- <string>.JSON()
- <string>.JSONArray()
- <value>.toJSON()
- <value>.toJSONPretty(indent)
- jmespath(expression, object)
- jsonpath(expression, object)
- jq(expression, object)

## Kubernetes
- k8s.cpuAsMillicores(string)
- k8s.getHealth(resource)
- k8s.getStatus(resource)
- k8s.getResourcesLimit(pod, resource)
- k8s.getResourcesRequests(pod, resource)
- k8s.isHealthy(resource)
- k8s.labels(object)
- k8s.memoryAsBytes(string)
- k8s.nodeProperties(node)
- k8s.podProperties(pod)

## Math
- math.Add(list)
- math.Sub(x, y)
- math.Mul(list)
- math.Div(x, y)
- math.Rem(x, y)
- math.Pow(x, y)
- math.Seq(list)
- math.Abs(x)
- math.greatest(list)
- math.least(list)
- math.Ceil(x)
- math.Floor(x)
- math.Round(x)
- math.Trunc(x)
- math.Sign(x)
- math.Sqrt(x)
- math.IsNaN(x)
- math.IsInf(x)
- math.IsFinite(x)
- math.bitOr(x, y)
- math.bitAnd(x, y)
- math.bitXor(x, y)
- math.bitNot(x)
- math.bitShiftLeft(x, n)
- math.bitShiftRight(x, n)

## Query Functions
- matchQuery(resource, query)
- matchLabel(labels, key, patterns)

## Random
- random.ASCII(length)
- random.Alpha(length)
- random.AlphaNum(length)
- random.String(length)
- random.String(length, charset)
- random.Item(list)
- random.Number(min, max)
- random.Float(min, max)

## Regular Expressions
- regexp.Find(pattern, input)
- regexp.FindAll(pattern, count, input)
- regexp.Match(pattern, input)
- regexp.QuoteMeta(string)
- regexp.Replace(pattern, replacement, input)
- regexp.ReplaceLiteral(pattern, replacement, input)
- regexp.Split(pattern, count, input)

## Strings
- <string>.abbrev(offset, maxWidth)
- <string>.abbrev(maxWidth)
- <string>.camelCase()
- <string>.charAt(index)
- <string>.contains(substring)
- <string>.endsWith(suffix)
- <string>.format(args)
- <string>.indent(width, prefix)
- <string>.indexOf(substring)
- <string>.indexOf(substring, start)
- <list>.join()
- <list>.join(separator)
- <string>.kebabCase()
- <string>.lastIndexOf(substring)
- <string>.lastIndexOf(substring, end)
- <string>.lowerAscii()
- <string>.matches(pattern)
- <string>.quote()
- <string>.repeat(count)
- <string>.replace(search, replacement)
- <string>.replace(search, replacement, limit)
- <string>.replaceAll(search, replacement)
- <string>.reverse()
- <string>.runeCount()
- <string>.shellQuote()
- <string>.size()
- <string>.slug()
- <string>.snakeCase()
- <string>.sort()
- <string>.split(separator)
- <string>.split(separator, limit)
- <string>.squote()
- <string>.startsWith(prefix)
- <string>.substring(start)
- <string>.substring(start, end)
- <string>.title()
- <string>.trim()
- <string>.trimPrefix(prefix)
- <string>.trimSuffix(suffix)
- <string>.upperAscii()
- <string>.wordWrap(maxWidth)
- <string>.wordWrap(maxWidth, lineBreakSequence)
- HumanDuration(seconds)
- HumanSize(bytes)
- Semver(version)
- SemverCompare(version1, version2)

## YAML
- YAML(string)
- <value>.toYAML()
- YAMLArray(string)

## TOML
- TOML(string)
- <value>.toTOML()

## GCP
- gcp.ParseIncidentTime(string)

## UUID
- uuid.Nil()
- uuid.V1()
- uuid.V4()
- uuid.IsValid(string)
- uuid.Parse(string)
